titleStmt.title: The triumphant lady: or, The crowned innocence· A choice and authentick piece of the famous, De Ceriziers, almoner to the King. / Translated into English, out of the original French, by Sir William Lower Knight.
Histoire d'Hirlande, ou l'Innocence couronnée. English
titleStmt.author: Cerisiers, René de, 1609-1662.
Lower, William, Sir, 1600?-1662.
Gaywood, Richard, fl. 1650-1680, engraver.
Barlow, Francis, 1626?-1702, artist.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Ga. Bedell, and Tho. Collins, and are to be sold at their shop at the Middle-Temple Gate in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Cerisiers, René de. L'Histoire d'Hirlande, ou l'Innocence couronnée.
The engraved frontispiece is signed by R. Gaywood after F[rancis] B[arlow], 1655.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "February 29"; the 6 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a 5.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
